attributes.action: Richard Littlejohn to be removed from the Daily Mail and to apologise for all of his wrong doings.
attributes.additional_details:
Richard Littlejohn, a man who's opinions and hate campaigns have led to public outrage and even the suicide of an innocent person.

His latest outburst was to belittle the hard work done by The Sophie Lancaster Foundation to finally put in steps to reclassify hate crimes.

His belief is that the whole thing is a joke and that it should not happen. In his article he also used a lot of offensive stereotypes to try and justify his outburst.

His journalism style is far from reader friendly and many people feel he should be removed from the daily mail.

This petition calls for his articles to be removed from the web, an apology made to everybody he has hurt and that donations be made to the family of the innocent person he drove to suicide and to the sophie Lancaster Foundation.

Enough is enough,  this man needs to be silenced.
